sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛First name,

Your Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Number is now active. You can book a service anytime you have an issue through our portal at 

Click here to book

Property Management Ltd

Hi Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛First name,

Your Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Number has been declined. Handyman insurance is available exclusively to current tenants. For further details, please reach out to Property Management Ltd.

 

Property Management Ltd for more information
